holidays.name: Endangered Species Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to raising awareness about endangered animals and the work needed to protect them.
holidays.origin: Officially recognized in the United States to encourage conservation efforts.
holidays.funFact: Many species that were critically endangered on May 21 years ago have made remarkable recoveries, thanks to dedicated conservationists.
